segments.text: I see the girl standing there, looking up at her brother with such hope in her eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just waiting for him to give her a cookie, and it’s so sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous this is, standing on a wet floor like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so precariously, and she’s just trusting him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t drop the plate he’s holding—it could break and cut him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and I’m worried they’ll slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious to the whole thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks outside the window, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the peaceful garden and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to warn them before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
